metadata.purpose: Final method assignments for Q001-Q030 with epistemic justifications
metadata.description: Each question receives epistemically justified methods following TYPE-specific requirements

Q001.question: D1-Q1: ¿El plan incluye diagnóstico de situación sobre derechos de las mujeres e igualdad de género?

N1-EMP.justification: N1a-OBS: Direct extraction of semantic chunks from policy document. Required for TYPE_A semantic bundling strategy. Preserves provenance and context for Dempster-Shafer combination.
N1a-OBS: Extracts gender-related keywords (género, mujer, igualdad, VBG, etc.) from text. Direct observation of document content.
N1a-OBS: Extracts diagnostic statements from PDT documents. Direct observation of diagnostic content.

N2-INF.justification: N2: MANDATORY for TYPE_A per episte_refact.md Section 2.2. Implements Dempster's rule for combining semantic beliefs with conflict resolution. Formula: m(A) = Σ(m1(X)*m2(Y))/(1-K) where K is conflict mass.
N2: Semantic triangulation across multiple sources (DANE, Med Legal, policy docs). Required for TYPE_A R2 strategy.

N3-AUD.justification: N3: MANDATORY for TYPE_A per episte_refact.md. Popperian veto gate: ONE semantic contradiction → confidence = 0.0. Enforces asymmetry where N3 can invalidate N1/N2.

Q001.overall_justification: Q001 requires semantic coherence assessment of gender diagnostics. TYPE_A strategy uses semantic bundling at N1 (preserving context), Dempster-Shafer combination at N2 (handling conflict), and contradiction veto at N3 (Popperian falsification). This ensures the diagnostic assessment is both comprehensive and logically valid.

Q002.question: D1-Q2: ¿El plan incluye metas cuantificadas de reducción de brechas de género?

N1-EMP.justification: N1a-OBS: Extracts prior beliefs about gender gap reduction from policy assumptions. Patterns: 'se espera', 'se asume', 'meta'.
N1a-OBS: Extracts observable evidence (statistics, measurements) for Bayesian updating. Searches for data patterns: 'tasa', '%', 'brecha'.
N1a-OBS: Extracts quantified targets (X% reduction, Y cases) from text.

N2-INF.justification: N2: MANDATORY for TYPE_B. Computes P(H|E) = P(E|H)*P(H)/P(E) for gap reduction estimates. Required for posterior estimation.
N2: Evaluates gap reduction metrics with Bayesian inference.

N3-AUD.justification: N3: MANDATORY for TYPE_B. p-value validation: if p > 0.05, confidence reduced. Ensures statistical rigor of gap reduction estimates.
N3: Validates minimum sample size (n ≥ 30) for statistical inference.

Q002.overall_justification: Q002 asks about quantified gender gap reduction goals - inherently Bayesian (prior beliefs about targets + likelihood evidence from statistics). TYPE_B strategy: N1 extracts priors/likelihoods, N2 computes posterior via Bayes update, N3 validates statistical significance. This ensures quantified goals are statistically sound.

Q003.question: D1-Q3: ¿El plan identifica recursos financieros para la implementación de acciones de género?

N1-EMP.justification: N1a-OBS: Extracts and normalizes financial allocations for gender actions. Converts COP to % of budget, per-capita values. Required for TYPE_D.
N1a-OBS: Extracts budget table data from PDT documents (SGP, SGR, recursos propios).

N2-INF.justification: N2: MANDATORY for TYPE_D. Expresses allocations as % of total budget for comparability. Formula: (amount / total_budget) * 100.
N2: Computes weighted financial coherence with documented weights (magnitud: 0.4, suficiencia: 0.4, cobertura: 0.2).

N3-AUD.justification: N3: Veto if budget_gap > 50% (block) or > 30% (reduce confidence 0.3x). Ensures financial viability of gender actions.

Q003.overall_justification: Q003 is purely financial - TYPE_D requires N2 dominance (aggregation over extraction). N1 extracts raw budget data, N2 normalizes and computes weighted mean for coherence assessment, N3 applies sufficiency veto. This ensures financial allocations are evaluated proportionally, not just nominally.

Q004.question: D2-Q1: ¿El plan describe actividades de capacitación en derechos de las mujeres?

N1-EMP.justification: N1: Extracts training budget allocations. Normalizes to % of budget for comparability.
N1: Extracts training activity descriptions (capacitación, taller, curso).

N2-INF.justification: N2: MANDATORY for TYPE_D. Weighted mean of training budget vs. described activities.

N3-AUD.justification: N3: Veto if training budget insufficient for described activities.

Q005.question: D2-Q2: ¿El plan establece metas de cobertura de servicios para mujeres víctimas de violencia?

N1-EMP.justification: N1: Extracts prior beliefs about service coverage targets.
N1: Extracts service coverage statistics from document.

N2-INF.justification: N2: MANDATORY for TYPE_B. Posterior estimation of coverage goals.

N3-AUD.justification: N3: Validates statistical significance of coverage estimates.

Q006.question: D3-Q1: ¿El plan define productos específicos: comisarías funcionales, casas de refugio?

N1-EMP.justification: N1: Extracts infrastructure budgets (comisarías, casas refugio).
N1: Extracts named products (Comisaría de Familia, Casa de la Mujer).

N2-INF.justification: N2: MANDATORY. Budget coherence for named infrastructure.

N3-AUD.justification: N3: Veto if insufficient budget for named products.

Q007.question: D3-Q2: ¿El plan establece metas de atención en comisarías funcionales?

N1-EMP.justification: N1: Extracts service capacity priors from policy assumptions.
N1: Extracts observed caseload data for Bayesian updating.

N2-INF.justification: N2: MANDATORY. Posterior estimation of service capacity goals.

N3-AUD.justification: N3: Validates significance of capacity estimates.

Q008.question: D6-Q1: ¿El plan articula una teoría de cambio para la igualdad de género?

N1-EMP.justification: N1: Extracts causal statements (X → Y) from text. Patterns: 'conduce a', 'genera', 'resulta en'.
N1: Builds causal graph nodes and edges from extracted links.

N2-INF.justification: N2: Validates DAG structure via Monte Carlo simulation.
N2: MANDATORY for TYPE_C. DFS cycle detection + topological sort.

N3-AUD.justification: N3: MANDATORY. TOTAL veto if cycle detected: confidence = 0.0. Causal DAGs must be acyclic.

Q009.question: D4-Q1: ¿El plan define indicadores de reducción de violencia de género?

N1-EMP.justification: N1: Budget for indicator monitoring systems.

N2-INF.justification: N2: MANDATORY. Indicator budget coherence assessment.

N3-AUD.justification: N3: Budget sufficiency for indicator systems.

Q010.question: D4-Q2: ¿Los indicadores son consistentes con las metas establecidas?

N1-EMP.justification: N1: Collects all indicator and goal statements as facts.

N2-INF.justification: N2: MANDATORY for TYPE_E. AND logic: consistency = min(c1, c2, ..., cn). NEVER mean().

N3-AUD.justification: N3: MANDATORY. ONE contradiction → confidence = 0.0. Popperian falsification.

Q011.question: D5-Q1: ¿El plan proyecta impacto en la brecha salarial de género?

N1-EMP.justification: N1: Prior beliefs about wage gap reduction targets.
N1: Labor market statistics for likelihood.

N2-INF.justification: N2: MANDATORY. Posterior estimation of wage gap impact.

N3-AUD.justification: N3: Validates statistical significance of impact projections.

Q012.question: D5-Q2: ¿Las proyecciones de impacto consideran tendencias demográficas?

N1-EMP.justification: N1: Per-capita normalization requires demographic data.

N2-INF.justification: N2: MANDATORY. Demographic-adjusted impact projections.

N3-AUD.justification: N3: Validates demographic-adjusted projections.

Q013.question: D1-Q4: ¿El plan incluye diagnóstico de seguridad y convivencia?

N1-EMP.justification: N1a-OBS: Semantic chunking for security diagnostics.
N1a-OBS: Extracts security keywords (conflicto, violencia, GAO, etc.).

N2-INF.justification: N2: MANDATORY for TYPE_A. Dempster-Shafer for multi-source security assessment.

N3-AUD.justification: N3: MANDATORY. Contradiction veto for security diagnostics.

Q014.question: D2-Q3: ¿El plan describe actividades de prevención del reclutamiento?

N1-EMP.justification: N1: Collects prevention activity statements.

N2-INF.justification: N2: MANDATORY for TYPE_E. MIN-based consistency check.

N3-AUD.justification: N3: MANDATORY. ONE contradiction → TOTAL veto.

Q015.question: D3-Q3: ¿El plan define productos: rutas humanitarias, redes de apoyo?

N1-EMP.justification: N1: Budget for humanitarian routes and support networks.

N2-INF.justification: N2: MANDATORY. Budget coherence for humanitarian products.

N3-AUD.justification: N3: Veto if insufficient for named humanitarian products.

Q016.question: D6-Q2: ¿El plan articula teoría de cambio para seguridad ciudadana?

N1-EMP.justification: N1: Extracts security causal links.
N1: Builds security causal graph.

N2-INF.justification: N2: MANDATORY. Cycle detection for security DAG.

N3-AUD.justification: N3: MANDATORY. Cycle veto for security theory of change.

N3-AUD.justification: N3: Significance validation of victimization consistency.

remediation_applied.n1_contamination_fixed: N1 subtype classification implemented - N1a-OBS vs N1b-CTX
remediation_applied.n2_underrepresentation_fixed: TYPE-specific layer ratios enforced via epistemic minima
remediation_applied.n3_sovereignty_fixed: Terminal verdict mode implemented - N3 violations are FATAL
remediation_applied.cross_question_homogeneity_fixed: Method diversity constraints applied per TYPE

next_steps: Audit: Check all 300 contracts against these assignments
Test: Verify N3 terminal verdict enforcement
